Topic.Title: Making an NPC move to random adjacent rooms

Posts.EditableText:

I've seen The Pixiv's NPC library but so far I can only make out the part to move around randomly to adjacent rooms till it goes into the same room as another object under the Search function, and I've also seen the actual Wiki http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/independent_npcs.html but what I can make out of it is patrolling randomly across different rooms, so I think it is possible to 'jump' rooms using the guide.
So far my current solution is to 'hard code' it, but it requires too much good than I think is necessary. Can someone help me to make Granny move about randomly to adjacent rooms? (please try to keep it simple HAHAHA)
